title: Treasury & Trade Solutions
tag-2: Our treasury services help optimize the needs of our clients on a global scale. Treasury and Trade Solutions provides global solutions that can help clients drive their business forward while investing in innovation to bring new solutions to life.
tag-4: Learn how Treasury and Trade Solutions transformed a multinational technology company’s B2B marketplace by providing greater transparency into incoming payments received by merchants.
tag-7: Our award-winning CitiDirect® digital banking platform provides anytime, anywhere access to Citi’s global cash management and trade solutions and is fully integrated with our CitiConnect® direct connectivity solution.
tag-9: Citi provided a solution for a British e commerce company to enable it to make digital payments all over the world in multiple currencies, providing speed, transparency and convenience whilst being cost efficient and secure.
tag-10: Citi helped a global healthcare solutions company transform a Decentralized Treasury Model to a Regional Center of Excellence: Exceeding Expectations and Achieving a Global Treasury Center of Expertise.
tag-11: Citi TTS helped an industry technology leader with more than 40 years of experience resolve their liquidity management inefficiencies, resulting in increased employee resources and reduction in costs.
